content: Lorraine, you make a good point. I didn’t take his saying “moral superiority” as better than other people’s morals, but i certainly see how it can read that way. Our lack of humility is a serious issue in this country. It’s good to be proud, but when we think we are better than other people/countries, that is a recipe for trouble. I also agree that our outsized egos have kept us from really caring about the earth in the way that we should. Thanks for your comment.
